title: Enabler: MIST - Setup IAM (cIAM) for MIST Environments
description:
Description
IAM intern (cIAM RS + cIAM SSO) - Development Adapter for MIST
IAM intern (cIAM RS + cIAM SSO) - realize connection cIAM / MIST
IAM intern (cIAM RS + cIAM SSO) - Setup Applications/Roles/Approval Workflow in cIAM RS
IAM intern (cIAM RS + cIAM SSO) - Setup MIST
Mit CIAM wollen wir geregelten Zugriff für interne Mitarbeiter auf MIST realisieren. 

Business Scope:
The connection to our internal access management has been provided so that an internal customer can also have access to our systems
acceptance_criteria: IAM intern (cIAM RS + cIAM SSO) - Development Adapter for MIST finished
IAM intern (cIAM RS + cIAM SSO) - realized connection cIAM / MIST
IAM intern (cIAM RS + cIAM SSO) - Setup Applications/Roles/Approval Workflow in cIAM RS
IAM intern (cIAM RS + cIAM SSO) - Setup MIST
If required: IAM extern (ICU) - Connecting MIST resource controller
